author: dj_rappa
post_text: June 6, 2014 at 11:26â€¯AM#1I have a show where a macro (which is triggered from sequence command) changes pages on the console as the show progresses.I want to have another station with its own user (for separate views and programmer) but to follow the page changes so it's executors are always on the correct same page as the master console.Is this possible?
title: Change pages across users
